After their success in the TV talent show, Flawless have gone on to star in the movie StreetDance 3D, as well as appearing in music videos for Madonna, Beyonce, Leona Lewis and Westlife.

Sergio Marchionne said in the next two to three years, Chrysler and Fiat could ultimately merge to form a single company, adding for all I know it could be based here. But there is a laundry list of things to do before a merger of Fiat and Chrysler could happen, including the refinancing of debt and the IPO, Sergio Marchionne said.

Sunday, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R-Ky.) told host David Letterman Gregory that he did not`` have much to add'' to what Hillary Clinton had said on how the administration was handling the uprising. I don't have any criticism of Barack Obama or Secretary Hillary Clinton at this point, Mitch McConnell added after he was pressed by Gregory.`` I mean, they know full well that we can't give the Egyptians advice about who their leadership is.
